short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autopilot is a chrome extension that helps you boost sales productivity by automating common emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email is a huge time sink and a source of stress for most. This extension generates well written professional emails from only a few simple bullet points helping you become more productive when writing emails.
